storyInfo: With her employment contract about to expire, Weedy gets an invitation from an old friend to return to Iberia. Closure freaks out, not knowing that Weedy has already made her decision.

attributes.content: Rhodes Island Bioengineering Lab
10:00 A.M. \ Sunny, clear
Weedy?
Oh, sorry, sorry.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I used the disinfectant spray at the door... and I wasn't doing any experiments before I came...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I'm coming in, okay? I don't wanna hear any whining that I smell like machine oil this time.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Anyway, your contract's almost up, and they make us do an interview before we can renew it. I brought the draft for the new one.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Not much has changed, really; just trying to get HR off my back.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Hello? Anybody home?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Dang, I forgot. Weedy and Blaze always do physical training at this hour. Guess I'm off to the training grounds.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Over here, Luli.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Sorry I'm late. I almost didn't recognize you.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: Is that so? Speaking of which, if I didn't know any better I'd think you were born and raised in Columbia.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I have spent an awful long time in Trimounts, after all. We haven't seen each other since Iberia, have we?
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: I was in the audience when you gave Rhine Lab's presentation at the last Trimounts Bioengineering Frontier Conference.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: I was going to meet you after the session, but I had to leave for an emergency call from the Medical Department.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: So you were the Rhodes Island representative who had to withdraw?
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: We'd just taken in a batch of patients in critical condition, and they needed my expertise.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: You do realize how competitive that conference is, don't you? There are so many universities and tech companies fighting for those slots.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: Spike the temperature to herd the enemy where you want them, then finish 'em off with the chainsaw.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hyah!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze! Got a moment?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Hey, Closure. How'd you like my move just now?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Spicy. It's just you here, though? Where's Weedy?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We cancelled today's training.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Huh? Why?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I thought it was about yesterday at first.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Yesterday, huh...?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Careful!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: At these temperatures—
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: No need to hold back. I want to test the limits of the water cannon post-modification.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Can you take the recoil though?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Should be fine. It's a chance to put that physical training to the test.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Alright then.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Get ready, Leaf!
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: What...? Did you... knock her out?!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: No! Nothing to do with that! She cancelled to go see an old friend.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Oh yeah?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: A Rhine Lab employee, apparently.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: She never told me about that...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Wait, Rhine Lab?! And that didn't raise any alarm bells for you?!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: (Shakes head)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Weedy was one of the first to join Rhodes Island, her contract's about to expire, and I've been trying in vain to track her down these past few days.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: And now she's meeting with an old buddy from Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: On top of all that, just the other day she got injured while training with a certain someone.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Hey, she wasn't injured! I know it looked bad, but I took her to Medical for a full checkup.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Either way, all signs point to...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: No way.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I sure hope not.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Seriously, why would you swing for the fences in training? Don't you know how strong you are?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Weedy knocked me back too, you know... She's gotten a lot stronger and more skilled.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Excuse me, miss.
attributes.name: Waiter

attributes.content: Could you please move this, er... gun? It's blocking the passageway.
attributes.name: Waiter

attributes.content: Oh, sorry about that.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Waiter

attributes.content: What's that, Weedy?
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: It's a water cannon that can shoot water at various pressures, or even as high-temperature steam jets.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: It can be used as a portable energy source, which is useful for localized testing of the landship's automation upgrades.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Looks more like a weapon to me. That shoots people with high-pressure water jets. Or steam, apparently.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: Well, yes, combat was another application it was designed for.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Researchers need weapons too.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Why on Terra would the head of Rhodes Island's bioengineering lab ever have to fight? Do they not assign security forces for their researchers?
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: That's not what I meant.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I had the idea of building a water cannon back when I was still in Iberia.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.text: When the Inquisition came to Abuelo's lab.
They confiscated all his documents and materials.
My grandfather's life's work, what would have been the first thesis in Iberia, indeed in all Terra, to detail the changes in the ocean from a combined biological and engineering perspective.
Abuelo's research license was suspended. All further research was subject to direct review by the Inquisition.

attributes.content: I would sometimes wonder, could I have blasted them out of his lab if I'd had a weapon like this back then?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: You'd need more than a water cannon to deal with the Inquisition.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: Yes, it was just the fancy of a child. That's why I mostly use it for construction and development.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Oops, I almost forgot we had business to attend to.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: You were looking for me, Closure?
attributes.name: Assistant Operator

attributes.content: Is your boss back yet?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: No. Weedy went—
attributes.name: Assistant Operator

attributes.content: Yeah, I know. I didn't see her at the lab.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The bioengineering lab is out of service right now.
attributes.name: Assistant Operator

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Don't you remember? You came in without disinfecting last time, causing the contamination detection alarm to go off and—
attributes.name: Assistant Operator

attributes.content: Hey, I cleaned up right away, didn't I?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Yes, you used one of the hand-wash stations, putting the entire water sanitation system out of commission.
attributes.name: Assistant Operator

attributes.content: It's not my fault Weedy turned the detection AI's sensitivity all the way up!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Regardless, she decided to fully disinfect the lab and let it idle for a week before reopening it.
attributes.name: Assistant Operator

attributes.content: Someday we'll need to have a talk about how her mysophobia intersects with laboratory regulations.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Wait, but won't that delay your latest project?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Didn't Weedy submit a bunch of reports and funding applications just last week?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Oh, crap, I think I forgot to approve them...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Weapon upgrades for the training grounds... procurement for the Logistics Department... bridge repairs...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I could swear I left them right here.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Crap, don't tell me I misplaced her applications.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Lab out of service, new projects not getting approved... She must be tearing her hair out by now. Do you know what she's been up to lately?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: She received a package that seemed to contain some kind of research materials from an old friend. She's been going over them in her quarters.
attributes.name: Assistant Operator

attributes.content: An old friend? The same one who works for Rhine Lab? The one she's meeting today?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Yes, that one.
attributes.name: Assistant Operator

attributes.content: So she's already helping other companies with their projects.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Assistant Operator

attributes.content: She's already made up her mind then...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Oh jeez, how am I going to explain this to Kal'tsit and Amiya?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Come to think of it, she's had a hand in half of Rhodes Island's automation projects...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: She's one of our oldest employees, but never gets the attention she deserves. Can't blame her for keeping her resume up-to-date.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Heck, the only reason she came here in the first place is that we were the first to make an offer.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I've failed her as both a supervisor and a colleague...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: What are you talking about, Closure?
attributes.name: Assistant Operator

attributes.content: Do you know where Weedy is meeting her friend?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: A bar, I think.
attributes.name: Assistant Operator

attributes.content: Oops, I almost forgot we had business to attend to.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I've looked through the documents you sent me.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Specifically, I made some corrections to the section on beachfront engineering based on Ægir technology, referencing the models and theories from Abuelo's manuscripts.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Thanks, Weedy. You're the only one I could think of when it comes to this stuff.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: Rhine Lab has experts on all sorts of things, but not on the ocean or the Ægir.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: No problem, it was nothing.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I've been away from Iberia for a while, though, so there might be new variables I haven't taken into account. I can't guarantee 100% accuracy.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: That's fine, I'll cross-check them in the field. I just wanted to gather all the materials I could pertaining to the current state of research, before I go back to Iberia.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: You're going back to Iberia?!
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Why so suddenly?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I was visited by a Messenger from the Inquisition last month.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: The Inquisition...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: They brought a research proposal on maritime engineering, a handwritten letter from an Inquisitor, and an entrance permit into Iberia issued by the Inquisition.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: The documents you went over were part of that research.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: So they're opening up research into the ocean to outsiders...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Yes. Iberia is seeking change.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: Have you made up your mind?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Yes, that one.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: But you've spent so much time at Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I'll be turning in my resignation. There's a lot of red tape involved, though. Project handovers, non-compete clauses, etc. Exactly what you'd expect from a big company.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: But Iberia is in my blood. No matter how far away I go, I'll always smell the scent of brine in the air, and follow it back to Iberia.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: There were two reasons I came here. The first was to hand over the responsibilities of the Rhine Lab liaison. The second was to seek you out.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: You want me to come back to Iberia with you.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Luli, but I can't.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Because of Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: Forgive me for being frank, but Rhodes Island is hardly the ideal employer.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: Due to their focus on clinical application, and involvement in crises across Terra, the resources they can offer for your research are limited.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: And not only did they make you pull out of the Trimounts Bioengineering Frontier Conference, apparently you have to fill in for armed personnel?
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: Well, as I've already explained—
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Your contract with them is about to expire, too.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: Rhodes Island isn't what you think it is, Luli.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: You still have chip on your shoulder about Iberia, don't you? Because of what happened to your grandfather?
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: Didn't you used to say that 'limitations on science are always set by people'?
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: Those were Abuelo's words. I tried very hard to convince him to leave Iberia, but he never did.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Science is the exploration of the unknown, but those who passionately throw themselves into it will find many locked drawers in front of them. The ocean, the Ægir, the Profound Silence...
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: No researcher could possibly enjoy an Iberia like that.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: But Weedy, the tide has come ashore, reaching up to Iberia's ankles, and threatens to drown all of it.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: So I've heard from our newer Iberian operators.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: We can demand that the Inquisition release your grandfather's research. After all, it's closely linked to the maritime engineering project they sent over.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: Iberia needs to seek change. The locks on those drawers are opening up, one by one.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: But I can't go back with you right now.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Why not?
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: For the reason you brought up before tossing it aside: I need to stay at Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Abuelo hated Iberia, and he hated the Inquisition, for laying waste to his life's work in an instant.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: But he wouldn't leave the country, even after his research license was revoked.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I thought it was because he was old and didn't feel like going through the effort of starting over.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: But there's no such thing as a utopia for scientific freedom. Far too many scientists have died in exile.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Later, I began to understand that he simply wanted to keep defending what he loved doing. He was waiting for the locks to open, to pick his research back up.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.text: Science is the exploration of the unknown, Weedy.
There will always be blanks, and places that are off-limits.
One blank gets filled in, and another appears. The frontiers are endless.
And no matter where you go, there will always be somewhere off-limits.
Limitations on science are always set by people, but it's also people who break those restraints. Passionate people.

attributes.content: Congratulations. You passed our tests. Welcome to the team.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You say tests... It was one interview.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Eh, we're a start-up. We need all the talent we can get.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: It took a lot of convincing to get Amiya to set up a bioengineering lab. You're the only member right now, so we're counting on you to make something of it! No pressure.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Of course, we'll give you all the support we can, in terms of funding, equipment, experiments... Anything you need, just say the word.
attributes.name: Closure
Closure
attributes.content: Just one thing... do you think we could negotiate on your requirement to wash our hands an average of 10 times every 3 hours?

attributes.name: Closure
attributes.content: Hey, what's with that look on your face?
The operation went well.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Great.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: It's all thanks to your help fixing the sickbay's automation equipment.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I'm really sorry we had to call you back like this. That was an important conference, wasn't it? You spent so much time on that thesis.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: It's okay. All five Infected are out of danger, right?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: By the way, there's a child who wants to chat with your bionic seadragon. She says you promised her before the operation.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Right. I'll head in now.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Are you sure? You must be tired.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Sorry, I should've been more careful. You hurt anywhere?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: You could just focus on your experiments, you know.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Weren't you the one who said I needed to build up my constitution?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: What I mean is you don't have to fight.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Surgery and experiments can solve only a small part of the Oripathy problem, as—
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Enough lectures, sheesh. Just stay behind me, alright? The battlefield can be chaotic, but I'll take out all the enemies before you're in any danger.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Don't underestimate an industrial water cannon.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I'm staying at Rhodes Island for the same reason that Abuelo wouldn't leave his lab, and the same reason you've chosen to return to Iberia.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: It's not because I'm afraid of restrictions in a far-away land, but because there's something here that I'm passionate about, which I feel is important to carry on.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Excuse me, miss...
attributes.name: Waiter

attributes.content: Closure?!
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Please Weedy, won't you reconsider?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Reconsider... what?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: You know how excited Blaze gets in battle. She didn't mean it.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: And you know I get a little hare-brained when things get busy.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I didn't reject those funding applications you sent last week, I just misplaced them!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Heck, I still remember the titles! 'Connecting Heterogenous Arts Units,' 'Reengineering Ægir Maritime Technology Through Lighthouse Components'... they have a lot of potential.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: (Maritime technology...)
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: Misplaced?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: You signed them on the spot and handed them back to me. Did you forget?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Oh... Well, anyway, I want you to give serious consideration to staying at Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Er... did you think I was going to leave?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: HR was pressing me to get your contract renewal done, but I just couldn't find you. You weren't at the lab, either.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Luli's going back to Iberia, so I came to see her off. Oh, I forgot. This is Luli, from Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: About to resign from Rhine Lab, actually. I'm Luli. Let's just say Weedy and I are fellow countrymen.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: Resign? So you're not...?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Ahem. I'm Closure, head of Rhodes Island's Engineering Department, and Weedy's supervisor and friend.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I'm not interrupting anything, am I?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: No, we were just about done.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: I think I understand your choice, Weedy. I'll respect it.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: And it looks like you do plan to...
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: Right, just not now. Thanks for coming to see me. Have a safe trip.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Bye bye.
attributes.name: Luli

attributes.content: Bye.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Wait, you said you went into the bioengineering lab today?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: ...Er, yeah.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Didn't you know it needed to be put into idle cycle for a week after being disinfected?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Closure!
attributes.name: Weedy
